about_the_game:
Time your jumps and double jumps in this side-scrolling 2D Action Platform Runner set in Ancient Ireland through 5 levels of increasing speed and difficulty!

Help the Druid Mug Ruith get an enchanted deadly orb to the Sun God Lúgh to use in his slingshot in a battle against his enemies.

Free Demo of Level 1 coming soon showing the original hand-drawn style in the Kerry Cave Level and a taste of the challenge ahead to reach the final round and beat the game.

Game Features:
- One button play (Spacbar, Gamepad A, Touchscreen)
- Hand-Drawn Original 2D Art.
- 5 levels of increasing difficulty with platforms moving and hazards attacking as you progress!
- Scores reset upon death and 1 life lost.
- Start with max 3 lives but add an extra life per level if you have fewer then 3 by passing the max score threshold of each level.
- Music is carefully selected and gameplay matched to the atmosphere of each location.
- Collect five treasures of Ériú, one is hidden in each level, to unlock a bonus level for those wanting the ultimate speed challenge mayhem!
- Sharpen your skills each playthrough to top the leaderboard when you finish the game.
- Claim ultimate glory...or at least small-fry indie game bragging rights!



What's the Story?

The powerful Druid Mug Ruith has created an enhanced magical orb in his cave lair for Lúgh, Champion of the Tuatha Dé Danann tribe, in his battle with the Fomor and their near invincible champion, Balor of the evil eye.

Mug's flying wheel can transport the orb but it needs your help as it spins in motion to jump and overcome the hurdles it faces on its journey across the land.

So, master one button play as you guide the enchanted orb housed in the flying wheel through the realms of Éirú - from Mug's sea cave in Kerry, through an ancient Limerick forest, across Clare's megalithic landscape passing bronze age villages on the way, then navigate the mighty River Sionna (Shannon) level to finally reach the battlefield plains of Moytura in Sligo and into Lúgh's hands in his moment of truth during a terrible battle to save his people.

This game is the first game in a series of interconnected games based on Irish Mythology and the Gods of Ériú Universe Ogma Games is creating.
All Mini games and 2D platformers are within the story arc of a planned 3D Demo about Lúgh and Balor based on an original script.

Join us as we bring it all to life. Images and Gifs will be added as each level is finished and added here so check back to see what's new.

What's with the two languages on some info?

There are a few Irish words alongside English ones so that Irish people can take pride in seeing our ancient language where it ought to be in an Irish Mythology based game!



Bain taitneamh as! Enjoy All!

name: Mug's Orb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Also plays on Steam Deck
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Time your Jumps and test your skills as you guide a charmed orb through Ancient Ireland in this hand-drawn 2D platform runner. Challenging increase in difficulty to test your skills and become part of the Gods of Ériú Universe in 5 levels and 1 bonus speed level!
